itunes:title: 288 - The Thing That Makes Being Discovered Impossible and How to Overcome It
itunes:author: Andy J. Pizza, Alex Sugg, Jordan Aaron, Ryan Appleton, Yoni Wolf
itunes:summary:
I spent the first part of my creative journey  desperately hoping to be discovered. The only problem? I was hiding! Life isn’t a game of hide and seek. No one is out there desperately trying to discover you against your will.

If you’re going to find the breakthrough you’re looking for you’re going to have to quit hiding and put yourself out there.

In this episode my friend and agent Ryan Appleton and I dive into:
- Why Hiding Your Way to The Top is a Terrible Plan
- 3 Places Artists Hide
- How to Show Yourself as an Artist
